## Checklist

- [ ] `cargo fmt` — code is formatted
- [ ] `cargo clippy` — no warnings
- [ ] `cargo test --workspace` — tests pass
- [ ] No secrets, credentials, or keys committed
- [ ] Database migrations (if any) are idempotent and tested against fresh + existing databases
- [ ] Security-critical changes flagged in description (ZK circuits, VRP, federation, auth, crypto)
- [ ] Changes are consistent with [FOUNDATIONS.md](../FOUNDATIONS.md)
